title: Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) shall come into operation 3
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 

(Commencement) (Amendment) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (alcohol) act 2018 (commencement) (amendment) order 2025

title: Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) shall come into operation 3
heading: 2. The Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (Commencement) Order 2023
text_raw:
2. The Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (Commencement) Order 2023 
(S.I. No. 248 of 2023) is amended by the substitution of the following Article 
for Article 2: 

“2. Section 12 (insofar as it is not already in operation) of the Public 
Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) shall come into operation 3 
years after the date on which this Order is made.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th September, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [422] 3
